title: Arsenal transfer news and rumours: Malcom, Jonny Evans, Theo Walcott, Cristian Pavon
description: All the latest Arsenal transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Thursday, January 11.
content: Arsene Wenger is eyeing up Bordeaux winger Malcom as a potential replacement to Alexis Sanchez, according to the Daily Mirror.It's claimed the Gunners have already started talks with the Ligue 1 club over the 20-year-old Brazil U23 international, who has also been linked with Manchester United.Arsenal's hopes of signing Jonny Evans have been dealt a blow by reports which claim Manchester City have held talks with West Brom over the Northern Ireland international.The Daily Mail confirm Arsenal are interested in Evans, but know they would not be able to match any offer City make to the 30-year-old.The Mail are also reporting that Everton will battle Southampton for Theo Walcott's signature.It's understood the Gunners may consider letting the England forward leave in January and the Toffees are confident they can beat the Saints to the 28-year-old's signature.Elsewhere, Boca Juniors have poured cold water on reports linking striker Cristian Pavon with a move to the Emirates."For the moment, we haven't received any proposal, formally or informally," club president Daniel Angelici said. "For now, they are all rumours, comments in the corridors.
